title: Molin Kaine
text: Molin Kaine is a lieutenant of the [[Redcloak Battalion]] of [[Sharn]] under Captain [[Khandan Dol]]. Molin is one of the few Redcloaks who enjoys being posted to the city. While indulging his many vices, Molin has crossed paths with House [[Tarkanan]] and its leader, Lady [[Thora Tavin]]. Thora has been luring him into the service of the houseâ€”but the Redcloak is interested in more than a working relationship with the crime lord.
